name: Neon Jam Session
description:
Rhythm game for mini jam 78: Chaos. Catch the blue bullets and dodge the orange spikes. Tell us your score in the comments!

Select a level with A or B. During gameplay, use A, X and spacebar to switch between lanes. You can also return to the main menu with P, and restart the level with 8.  

Art by ASillyVole

Audio by Osun

Code by TheDerpie

if someone wants me to make a map importer for this game i can it wouldn't take me long
